## Protocol.DOMSnapshot.CaptureSnapshotRequest.includeDOMRects property

Whether to include DOM rectangles (offsetRects, clientRects, scrollRects) into the snapshot

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
includeDOMRects?: boolean;
```
